title: A proclamation against new buildings
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: In the Savoy, Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
At head of title: By the King.
At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehall, the seventh day of April, 1671.
